ul_502475: set -- env GOPATH=/some/path go build ${PACKAGE}

$ PACKAGE='hello world'
$ set -- env GOPATH=/some/path go build ${PACKAGE}
$ i=1; for param in "$@"; do printf '$%d = "%s"\n' "$i" "$param"; i=$((i+1)); done
$1 = "env"
$2 = "GOPATH=/some/path"
$3 = "go"
$4 = "build"
$5 = "hello"
$6 = "world"

Explanations about Options.-s(M):
The name of the user's new login shell. Setting this field to blank causes the system
 to select the default login shell.
